i think towers and golems are good, honestly, as towers (to my best 
recollection) are somewhat equivalent to an automated defense system, 
like in Aliens, and thus can't really have great attacks or abilities 
or locomotion. as for golems, they get mad strong at higher levels 
with their exploding boulders and whatnot but they still can't move 
around so good, which could be a problem (Labyrinth). so, what to do. 
i say remove golems as they can't work good and keep towers as they 
can.

Oldschool
